General.Name: TQM Corporation Public Company Limited
General.Description: TQM Alpha Public Company Limited engages in the insurance brokerage business in Thailand. The company offers life and non-life insurance products comprising car, travel, accident, health, life, home, and special insurance, such as motor, add on, surf stake, gadget, and motorcycle insurance. It also provides personal loans; and procurement and consulting services for computer software and hardware. The company was formerly known as TQM Corporation Public Company Limited and changed its name to TQM Alpha Public Company Limited in May 2022. The company was founded in 2011 and is headquartered in Bangkok, Thailand. TQM Alpha Public Company Limited is a subsidiary of Eternal Growth Corporation Company Limited.

6.Name: Mr. Nikom  Chankong
6.Title: Exec. VP of Claim & Legal Affairs
